title: Montana Ricochet
description: When Daisy Newton comes to marry Corporal Cade Hadley, has she found the man of her dreams? Evan and company desperately search for the serial killer. Could Corey March be involved or is he as innocent as he claims? Echo Canyon Brides series reading  Book 1: Montana Rescue Book 2: Montana Bargain Book 3: Montana Adventure Book 4: Montana Luck Book 5: Montana Fire Book 6: Montana Hearts Book 7: Montana Christmas Book 8: Montana Orphan Book 9: Montana Surprise Book 10: Montana Miracle Book 11: Montana Ricochet
author: Linda Bridey
